document.full_text: shane mosley feels a victory over wbo welterweight champion manny pacquiao on saturday would be his biggest ever despite a glittering career that includes world titles in three weight classes.
document.title: underdog mosley says pacquiao win would be career best
lines_and_colors: shane mosley feels a victory over wbo welterweight champion manny pacquiao on saturday would be his biggest ever despite a glittering career that includes world titles in three weight classes.
